transcript.title: Appointment Of Secretary Of The Department Of Education, Science And Training
transcript.content:
I am pleased to announce the appointment of Dr Jeffrey Harmer as Secretary of the Department of Education, Science and Training.

Dr Harmer will commence a three-year appointment on 10 March 2003. He will fill the vacancy left by the appointment of Dr Peter Shergold AM to my Department.

Dr Harmer has been Managing Director of the Health Insurance Commission since 1998 and previously held positions at the Deputy Secretary level in the then Departments of Social Security and Housing and Regional Development. After completing a Diploma in Education, he went on to complete a Doctor of Philosophy at the University of New South Wales in the field of Economic/Urban Geography. A copy of Dr Harmer's curriculum vitae is attached.

I am confident that Dr Harmer's extensive experience in policy development and programme delivery, as well as his work on numerous Commonwealth-State agreements, will fit him well for his new role.

26 February 2003

CURRICULUM VITAE

Name:

Dr Jeffrey Allan HARMER

Date of Birth:

19 September 1949

Educational qualifications:

Bachelor of Arts with Honours, University of New South Wales

Diploma of Education, University of New South Wales Doctor of Philosophy in Economic/Urban Geography, University of New South Wales

Present position:

Managing Director, Health Insurance Commission

Previous experience:

1996-98 Deputy Secretary, Department of Social Security

1994-96 Deputy Secretary, Department of Housing and Regional Development

1985-94

Senior Executive Service positions in the Departments of Housing and Construction, Community Services and Health and Human Services and Health

1978-85

Various positions in several Commonwealth departments

1973-78

Tutor in Applied Economic Geography, University of New South Wales
